attributes.additional_details: The Murderers appear to have on fear of the current laws of the UK
attributes.background: Petition Bring back the death penalty. The death penalty should be an option for convicted terrorists, mass murderers, and child killers. Only one appeal should be allowed, with no right to legal aid, which must be lodged and heard within 3 months of conviction.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Reintroduce the death penalty for people found guilty of terrorism
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710686

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710
